subject: Baseball
Baseball (College)
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera III, the son of the former Yankees closer Mariano Rivera, continued pitching for Iona after being chosen in the 29th round of baseball’s 2014 draft.
snippet: Mariano Rivera III, the son of the former Yankees closer Mariano Rivera, continued pitching for Iona after being chosen in the 29th round of baseball’s 2014 draft.
